body:
Another possible implementation would be to modify `im2col` to handle this case.
When out of boundary, instead of setting to 0 in [here](
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THNN/generic/Col2Im.c#L77-L78)
you'd instead return a the value of the input at the position.
